title: The Bully Killers Serial Novel: Part I
description: The Bully Killers Serial Novel is about a small-town family from the Midwest that has slipped through the cracks, and without any extended family the Dalingers are taking on life without a net while at the same time struggling with a mean streak of madness that runs in the family bloodline...and some of the voices inside their heads are dangerous.  Follow Josie, Charlie, and Jerome as they tightrope walk between reality and insanity while trying to carve out a place in the world they can call their own. http://thebullykillers.com
author: Michael J. Engelby
